It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-法治(一)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(二)

description.zh: 本課程教授近代百年設計，以平面設計為主軸，同時亦對當時設計運動所影響的設計相關領域，包括產品、服飾、室內與建築設計風格，做關聯性的介紹。透過近代百年設計發展主要運動的介紹，建立學生對於設計史的知識與設計文化涵養的紮根，並學習思考設計運動時代下的美學思潮脈絡與發展關係。
description.en: This course introduces students to graphic design as well as the influence of design movement in the fields of products, fashion, interior and architecture design that shaped the twentieth century in design. Through the introduction of the twentieth century in design, this course advances student’s understanding of design history and cultural enrichment. Students take an in-depth look at the context and development of movements that are significant in the history of design.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹程式設計的基礎，透過腳本式語言(Script Language)及基礎程式語言的應用，培養學生程式設計的基本能力。本課程除加強技術開發能力外，也將導引學生，如何透過獨立思考來面對問題及分析問題，並透過程式的撰寫來解決問題。
description.en: This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解設計的基本要素與美的形式原理，應用各種媒材的特性與構成，從平面及立體的構成的實作練習中，激發出設計美感與創造力。透過「使用者—產品—環境」三者間互動關係的深入探討，掌握住視覺傳達與多媒體的基本語彙，作為互動設計的基礎，創造出全新的體驗與感受。
description.en: The course is to prepare students for understanding the basic elements of design and the form and principle of art. To achieve these goals, the course provides opportunities for students to apply characteristics and compositions of diverse media for the form of two-dimension and three-dimension in practice. Also, the course arouses student’s design aesthetics and creativity. To explore the context of user-product-environment, students understand visual communication and multimedia language as a basis of interaction design toward completely new experiences and sensation.

notes: 需修過基本設計(一)才可修課

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹情境劇本法 (scenario) 之相關知識與其在互動設計上之應用。藉由此課程的學習，學生可以了解如何使用代表性的角色擬定以及故事板的操作以發現關鍵設計議題。透過方法的了解以及實作模擬，學生能具備業界所需之互動情境或介面設計應有之情境敘事技巧與能力。課程內容包含情境故事法介紹、人-機-境概念、互動情境模擬、代表性角色擬定以及故事板製作。學生評量方式則包含報告撰寫以及作業繳交。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce basic knowledge and application of scenario technique on interaction design. Through this course, students can understand how to define the characters of an interactive scenario and develop storyboard to draw out key design theme. Students will be capable of scenario technique for practical interaction design. Course contents include introduction of scenario method, human-machine-scenario, interactive scenario narration, character mapping and storyboard. Students will be evaluated by reports and their works.

notes: 媒體設計組必修,限本系生修課上限63人(第二專長)

description.zh: 色彩在藝術史的發展過程中，一直以其獨特的內在感覺邏輯與外在現實世界不停的交互進行運動，因而織就一門豐富的內在視覺感知語彙。本學期課程除延續上學期色彩調和論的介紹外，亦藉由對色彩原理、感覺與運用方式循序漸進的課堂操作，以及作品色彩操作形式的分析，讓同學能夠活用色彩成為一種造形語彙。
description.en: In the history of art, color science has made its unique The course is designed as an introduction to color harmonies following last semester and examines colors from as many ways as possible. Through progressive training and the case analysis of artworks, students learn to add colors to have their own design style.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組必修,105-2 新聘教師

description.zh: 訓練以徒手素描來進行二維與三維的設計思考與呈現。
description.en: Developing the advanced techniques of freehand sketching for both two-dimensional and three-dimensional design thinking and communication.

description.zh: 在這個e化的時代，傳送訊息的表現手法如文字、影像、聲音、影片等都被廣泛的運用，組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料的就成了一個必須重視的課題。本課程將導覽文化創意產業之定義、起源與當前文化創意產業之背景，進而將藝術與文化產業整合於數位內容中；課程規劃重點包含建立學生對數位產品的基本認識，解說數位產品設計的流程與步驟，介給數位產品設計的方法。
description.en: In the electronic age, text, image, sound and video are all widely used; the organization of these data has become an important issue. This course focuses on the definition, origin and background of cultural creative.  Curriculum includes build basic understanding of digital products, explain the process and procedure of how digital products are designed, and introduce design methods of digital products.

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生學習包括2Ｄ平面設計及3Ｄ造形模擬基礎電腦輔助設計軟體程式之應用要領、傳輸介面及其週邊設備之規劃，並配合上機實習，以培養學生互動設計圖像製作的基礎。
description.en: This course will provide student in the field of interaction design the application skill, principle, planning, limitation and conversion techniques of 2D/3D graphic design by using computer-aided design software package.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組選修,限本系生,修課上限63人(第二專長)

description.zh: 科技行銷的重點在於針對現在的科技產業、產品、技術、服務等等商品、巿場作一系統的、科學的、實務的研究與探討，其主要內容含：1.何謂科技產品，2.何謂科技巿場，3.科技產品的行銷定位，4.科技行銷策略研究，5.科技產品行銷推廣與調查，6.科技技術轉移及專利行銷，7.科技產業國際行銷，8.科技行銷的新趨勢。
description.en:
1.What is technology product? 
2.What is technology marketing? 
3.Strategy study of technology marketing. 
4.Market survey of technology product. 
5.Technology transfer.  
6.Patent marketing.  
7.International marketing strategy, 
8.Development of technology marketing.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en:
With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.
Outline:
1. Overview of Information Retrieval
2. Modeling
3. Retrieval Evaluation
4. Text IR
5. Query Languages and Operations
6. Indexing and Searching
7. Applications for IR
8. Web Search

description.zh:
Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。
本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Objective-C 語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用OpenGL es 實作有趣的3D 應用程式。
本課程大致如下：
1. 導論
2. Objective-C
3. iOS系統架構
4.Xcode開發工具安裝與使用
5.基礎UI設計與多國語言
6. 核心應用程式設計
7. 感應器應用
8. 多媒體與相機功能
9. OpenGL ES
10. 擴增實境
11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en:
In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:
˙Introduction to iOS
˙How to program in Objective-C
˙Using X-Code 
˙The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application
˙iOS MVC structure
˙Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras
˙Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files
˙OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application
˙Project Demo and Review
˙How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

description.zh:
本課程涵蓋生產強健、高品質軟體的流程、方法與工具。學生將能
�P了解軟體品質保證的原因與目的
�P了解品質保證的內容，含軟體品質保證、建構管理、驗證、測試與評估
�P了解軟體生命週期與軟體流程
�P了解Cleanroom軟體工程的機構
�P了解建構管理的功能，含識別、控制、稽核、及狀態報告等
�P了解自動化建構管理的模型，含簽入/簽出、長交易、構成與變更追蹤等
�P了解驗證的方法，含reviews、inspections、walkthroughs與稽核等
�P了解應用於表示源碼的圖論
�P建構路徑、分支與使用含蓋的測試
�P建構基於等價分割、邊界值分析、因果分析的測試
�P建構單元、整合、系統測試的策略
�P熟練JUnit自動化單元測試
�P了解軟體品質保證的量測
description.en:
This course covers processes, methods, and tools associated with the production of robust, high-quality software. The student will be able to
�P  understand the reason and purpose of software quality assurance.
�P comprehend the ingredients of quality assurance: software quality assurance; configuration management; verification and validation; and test and evaluation.
�P understand software life cycles and software processes.
�P know the mechanics of Cleanroom software engineering.
�P understand the functions of configuration management: identification, control, auditing, and status accounting.
�P know the models of automated configuration management: check-out/check-in, composition, long transaction, and change tracking.

notes: 兼任張凱雄客座教授(資工四、資工所與電資外生專班合

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧"的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。
description.en: Artificial intelligence seeks to introduce the elements of intelligence into programs and systems in application domain. Topics will include 1. Searching methods 2. Propositional and Predicate logic 3. Theorem Proving 4. Knowledge-based systems and representation of knowledge 5. Machine learning, 6. Genetic algorithms and evolutionary computing, 7. Intelligent agents.

description.zh: 本課程是大學部程度的巨量資料分析導論課程，主要介紹資料前處理、資料探勘概念、關聯分析、分類、分群、平行化程式設計、分散式計算、以及實際平台工具如: MapReduce, Spark等。除了基本概念的介紹外，透過程式練習以及期末專題，能讓學生深入理解巨量資料分析的基本原理以及實際工具的應用。
description.en: This undergraduate-level course offers an introduction to the concepts in big data analytics. Topics include data preprocessing, data mining, association rule, classification, clustering, parallel programming, distributed computing, MapReduce, and Spark. Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in big data anlaytics.

description.zh: 本課程介紹超文本標記語言(HTML)語法與層疊樣式表(CSS)之應用。課程內容包括：1. 超文本標記語言 2. 層疊樣式表 3. JavaScript 直譯式腳本語言 4. HTML5 APIs 語法 5. CSS3 特徵 6. DOM 文件物件模型 7. JQuery 函式庫 8. JSON 資訊交換語言 9. AJAX 非同步傳輸 10. SVG 可縮放向量圖形 11. HTML5 Canvas 應用程式介面 12. WebGL 三維繪圖 13. 自調式網頁設計 14. Bootstrap 15. 網頁文字編排學 16. 網頁字型。
description.en: This course introduces HyperText Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). The course topics include: 1. HTML syntax, 2. CSS syntax, 3. JavaScript, 4. HTML5 APIs syntactic features, 5. CSS3 features, 6. Document Object Model (DOM), 7. jQuery library, 8. JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), 9. Asynchronous JavaScript and XML (AJAX), 10. Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), 11. HTML5 Canvas API 12. WebGL, 13. Responsive Web Design (RWD), 14. Bootstrap, 15. Web Typography, 16 Web Fonts.

notes: 修課人數限56人,超過上限時,經同意者方能修習。科1223

description.zh: 本課程在於介紹科學及工程系統中數項常用數學之原理及應用，內容涵蓋微分方程、差分方程及複變分析。授課內容大綱如下：1.一階微分方程式2.線性二階及高階微分方程式3.微分方程式之級數解4.差分方程5.複數及複變函數6.複數積分7.複冪級數8.餘數定理
description.en: This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential Equations2.Second-Order and Higher Order Linear Differential Equations.3.Series Solutions of Differential Equations4.Difference Equations5.Complex Number and Complex Functions6.Complex Integration7.Complex Power Series8.	Residue Theorem

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.zh: 商業與科技的日新月異乃現代生活之重要標的，本課程選讀書報雜誌中有關經貿企管等商業論述，以及科技資訊等相關文章，以討論方式，引導學生進入現代工商科技化的英語環境。
description.en: This course will guide students to read articles on technology and business from a variety of sources (books, magazines, newspapers, television scripts, etc.)  Students are required to actively participate in the speaking activities in the classroom which may involve group discussion and oral presentation of a specific topic.

description.zh: 「生命科學與工程」課程融合生物與工程兩門學科，內容涵蓋生命科學領域（分子、細胞、組織、器官、系統、個體、行為等）及工程領域（化學、化工、材料、電子、電機、機械、土木等，以及影像、量測、模式等方法）。授課內容盡量以引發學生興趣為主，目的在使工程領域的學生能明白生命科學對工程設計的影響，以及使生物領域的學生能瞭解工程對於生命科學的幫助；兩者相輔相成，相互影響。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate engineering students with the objective of introducing the fundamentals of life sciences while pointing out the areas in which engineering plays a pivotal role in the advent. Students are to be provided with perspectives on the interplay between biology, engineering, and biotechnology, with emphasis on the quantitative and integrative nature of biological and bioengineering problems. The contributions of engineering to life science are illustrated with the design and manufacturing of tools essential for observations and applications in medicine, agriculture and environment.

notes: 大四合開,人數限55人【停開】

description.zh: 本課程在介紹給水之淨化以及廢水之處理，以應當前之需要，其內容包括水質概述，用水標準，淨水工程，污水處理，污水特性，水體白淨，物理、化學及生物處理方法，污泥處理，回收利用等學理與實務並重，使學者對水及廢水處理問題有一基本暸解，進而可應用於特殊用水及廢水處理。
description.en: An introduction to the purification of drinking water and waste water treatment. Lectures include water quality, water purification engineering, waste water characterization and treatment, chemical, physical and biological methods for waste water treatment.

description.zh: 介紹晶體形成過程、相變化與結構狀態、物性與化性關係以及其有關之探討技術與應用。
description.en: Solid state chemistry introduces the process of the crystal growth, phase change and the structural state.  The course also discusses the relationship of its chemical and physical properties.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹各種能源的來源、轉換、儲存與其再生利用轉換之技術，重點包括燃燒、廢熱回收、核能動力、太陽能及燃料電池同時並強調經濟效益評估，程序效益分析及操作設備的節能措施。
description.en: Introduction to the technology of energy consernation and renewable energy conversion. subjects such as combustion, waste-neat recovery, solar energy, nuclear energy, and fuel cell are included special topics including economic evaluation, process efficiency analysis, and energy saving operation for separation units are also emphasized.

description.zh: 化工實務是一門針對進入化工領域之初學者，提供全面性介紹的課程，引導學生瞭解化學工程的內容及未來的化工生涯，並介紹我國化工業的現況及未來展望。此外，本課程還提供許多專業以外的知識,以加強一個化學工程師的訓練。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamentals of chemical Engineering Courses will help students realize the various applications chemical engineering and the future carrier development. The course will also provide the professional knowledge and intensive training on chemical engineers.

notes: 化工一丙與工程一合開

description.zh:
本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點
材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件
燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學
生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en:
The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powder
metallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, super
heat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students who
learn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to the
application of powder metallurgy techniques.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 課程內容包含薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

notes: 限工程學士班及三甲以上重修；計網電腦教室，限20人

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 材料表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface coating and chemical surface treatment are the main subjects to be taught in this course. The phase composition of the each coating methods is introduced initially. Association of theses process with chemical pre-treatment of the material surface is reviewed next. Both experimental procedures and techniques base on concepts of electrode reactions and impedances are discussed during the entire presentation of this course.

description.zh: 隨著先進能源科技的快速進展，各種形態能源的生產、儲存、再生、與利用成為技術發展的重點。材料科技是提升能源效率的重要一環，本課程結合包括金屬、陶瓷、高分子、奈米等複合材料系統，討論材料在在包括儲氫合金、二次電池、燃料電池、太陽能電池、熱電、超電容等新型能源儲存或生產等裝置上的應用領域與其限制。
description.en: The demands for advanced energy requires the development of technologies for sustainable energy production, converting, and storage. Materials are key blocks to improved performance in new energy technologies. These new materials systems often combine the knowledge in the fields of metals, ceramics, polymer, and nano-materials. This course will discuss the applications and limits of materials in hydrogen storage, secondary batteries, fuel cells, solar cells, thermoelectric devices, and supercapacitors to give undergraduate students a basic understanding of energy-related materials.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 此課程之教學內容包括：概論與儀器使用，字法與線法，應用幾何學，投影幾何學，正投影法則與基本製圖，曲線軟體，機械工作圖及製圖軟体使用。
description.en: The content of this course include the brief introduction and instrument application, The drawing of line, lettering, applied geometry, descriptive geometry, orthography projective rule and fundamental graphics, curve line software, mechanical working drawing, and graphics software application.

description.zh: 基於學生畢業後的生涯發展，本課程目標旨在提供學生清楚認知未來的生涯發展，進而規劃自己的進路。針對設計學生畢業後的發展可以從學術界與實務界兩方面考量，學術界以直升研究所或工作後再修讀在職專班，而實務界則以可從事的相關職場做介紹與分析各行業的特色與前途，可擔任的職務名稱包括：互動設計師、互動程式設計師、使用者介面設計師、互動廣告企劃等，以供學生參考。
description.en: Based on the personal career development,  the course aims to provide a clearly scope and knowledge of future career development. This career can be analyzed in two categories, one is academic field that provide the master program and in-job training program; the another is practical field which concerns about more related design job, such as interaction designer, interactive programmer, user interface designer and interactive advertisement planner. This course not only introduces the design-related job, but also analyzes their characteristics and future development route.

description.zh: 數位製造為一利用數位輔助設計軟體與製造工具將設計想法實現的過程。本課程將這個過程所需要的數位技術模組化，並以系統性的方式逐一介紹各技術模組的理論與操作，藉以培養以三維方式進行設計思考，並能以數位設計與製造流程來實現設計的能力。
description.en: Digital fabrication is a process to realize a design idea through the use of 3D modeling and manufacturing tools. The modularized technologies related to the digital fabrication will be introduced systematically in this course. The aim of this course is to extend the computer-aided design workflow from design thinking to digital fabrication.

notes: 光華館409室,請自備筆記型電腦,限本系生,修課上限18人

description.zh:
1. 架構影片後期製作流程
2. 電腦動畫及視覺特效於影片後製作階段的應用
3. 學習合成與剪接的概念與技巧
4. 暸解最新動畫影視特效趨勢及發展
5. 培養後期製作專案提案與執行能力
description.en:
1. To construct a post-production project
2. To apply animation and visual effects to post-production works
3. To develop concepts and skills in compositing and editing
4. To understand the trends and development in animation effects
5. To develop the ability to propose and execute a post-production project

notes: 媒體設計組選修,修課上限60人

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部與進修學院二技合開(建築)

name.zh: BIM建築資訊系統實務及應用
name.en: The practice and application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: BIM在建築生命週期中，可借由3D視覺模擬於規畫設計階段相互溝通，施工階段時，最重要碰撞撿討、4D進度模擬、施工圖面整合，5D 估價計算，可協助建案進行更加順利。本課程除介紹BIM發展現況及各國相關証照外，並針對學生軟體工具使用再提升，以進階建模及整合之軟體操作為主。
description.en:
Building Information Modeling (BIM) in the building life cycle by 3D visual simulation in the design phase of the planning to communicate with each other, the construction phase, most important collision picking discuss the integration of 4D progress of the simulation, the construction drawings 5D valuation calculations, can assist in building cases smoothly.
This course introduces the BIM use of development status of countries and relevant certificates type. And re-enhancement for student software tools use Advanced modeling and integration of software operation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、而收至古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

notes: 四建一與四創意一合開(限主修建築系選課)

description.zh:
本課程研究建築細部設計，並幫助學生發展建築和其組成元素之間的關係的理解，藉由分析和設計練習如何建造的邏輯、建築元素的製造與組構，接頭、以及整個結構的組織構成，以確保具備技能來面對在建築細部設計中的挑戰。
本課程也透過各種材料和工法的探究，以及銜接設計概念與構築過程，為學生在細部設計上提供多樣化的創作可能性。
description.en:
The course studies architectural detailing, and helps students to develop an understanding of the relationship of architecture and its elements, for ensuring their skills and capabilities to the challenges in detailing for architectures as well as researching the existing cases in built examples, through one series of trainings of analyzing and practicing the logic of construction, fabrication of architectural elements, joints, and the organization of entire structures. 
By engaging in various aspects of materials and methods, this course aims to provide students the unlimited creative possibilities in Detail Design by making connections between the design concept and fabrication processes.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程是敷地計畫學的延續，授課目標在培養學生對於建築基地的實務規劃與設計能力。授課內容著重敷地計畫學所探討的理論及技術如何應用於實際的操作層面。以校外專家配合教學，介紹各種實際案例並分析其優缺點。學生透過課堂的討論及實地的調查、分析及校外的參訪，來瞭解敷地計畫的所涵蓋的重點實務工作，進而研習各項課題的解決對策與方法，使其具備建築相關業界所需的專業知識及技能。
description.en: The course is to explore the practical skills on site planning and design techniques. Teaching materials cover the basic components and their various applications of the site planning. Professional experts are invited to join the training program. Both advantages and disadvantages of each case are introduced and analyzed. Through class discussions and field studies, students can recognize the actual contents and issues during the site planning and design process. Strategies and solutions to the planning and design problems will be facilitated to help students to get the better professional abilities to qualify related architectural design works’ needs.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh:
本課程教學之目的為使同學了解各系統之設備概要，管線配置及管道空間設計應注意之事項，希望同學具備與專業機、水電技師討論之能力： 
(1)從空調、電力、給排水、消防運輸…等設備，探討建築物理環境控制系統的特性，了解如何從建築之計劃、設計、施工至使用管理等各階段與建築設備之搭配。
(2)探討建築設計於電力、照明、空調、熱水及再生能源…等系統節約能源的做法及其效益
課程目標：
(1)使學生了解各環境控制系統之內容及其特性，做為創造節能舒適且方便之建築空間之基底。
(2)使學生了解各環境控制系統之設備、管線空間大小、配置應注意事項。
(3)使學生具有與機、水電專業技師討論之能力。
(4)使學生能了解推動綠建築所需之電力、照明、空調、熱水、再生能源設備節能技術。
課程期間若有機會將安排實地設備參觀。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is teaching students to understand the equipment to make a summary of the various systems, plumbing and piping space design should pay attention to the matter, I hope the students have the ability to discuss with the professional machines, electrical and mechanical technician:
(1) From the air conditioning, electrical, plumbing, fire protection and other equipment transportation ... to explore the physical properties of building environmental control systems, learn how from a planned architecture, design, construction management, to be used with the various stages of the construction equipment.
(2) To explore the architectural design for power, lighting, air conditioning, hot water systems and renewable energy ... energy conservation practices and their effectiveness
Course Objectives:
(1) Enable students to understand the content and features of the environmental control system, as the creation of energy-efficient, comfortable and convenient base building sp

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh:
本系在強調理論與實務並重的教學規劃中，隸屬建築技術體系的建築材料、構造、施工課程以五個學期分年循序漸進地建置。其中本課程為技術課程之最後一哩，整合前期授業內容之整合、亦屬工程案例之實務解析。
本門課在十八週的進度規劃下，以三個子單元形成授業的主要架構:第一單元「建築生產」:主要從近年建築產業的趨勢，講解全球化、市場需求、國土戰略、城鄉變遷等因素下，對於建築業的衝擊與因應而生的技術發展內容；第二單元「建築細部設計技術」:從建築構法計畫的角度分析各種設計性能落實於細部時如何解決聲音、照明、熱傳、空氣、水等課題；第三單元「設計/施工技術案例」：實際以本校近期新建工程(精勤樓、誠樸樓、億光大樓)為例，結合校外協力專家進行專案案例之進程與技術管理要點之分享。

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解現行都市計畫法及相關法令體系的重要內容，同時針對實際案例予以檢討、分析。授課主題涵蓋：1.現行都市計畫法之法令體系、2.我國都市計畫法之發展沿革、3.都市計畫法的條文內容及相關問題、4.土地使用分區管制規則、5.營建法規電腦查詢系統之使用、6.未來都市計畫法修法之方向、7.都市計畫法規施行案例分析。

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)【停開】

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理

Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部二技合開(建築)

description.zh: 1.建築管理行政體系及法源介紹。2.建築管理之對象人、事、物介紹。3.建築許可之申請、審核、核發、列管及追蹤作業。4.建築物之施工管理及工程糾紛處理。5.建築物使用與變更使用之管理。6.建築物昇降設備管理制度介紹。7.建築物違章之查報與拆除。8.建築物公共安全檢查法律依據及作業程序。9.建築管理的發展方向。10.建築師及營造業管理之基本概念及未來之工作方向。
description.en: 1.	Introducing the hierarchical of building department and government administration rules of the building.2.	Introducing administrative terms of building with owner, designer or supervisor of building, construction work, building site, and building itself.3.	Application procedure for a building permit, include application, judgement, approbation, management and audit.4.	Administration for Building construction and construction dispute intermediation.5.	Administration for building occupancy and alterations.6.	Introducing administration of building elevator facilities.7.	Illegal building administration and dismantling.8.	Inspection procedure for building safety and procedure rules.9.	The development direction of building administration.10.	The basic concept and executive direction in the future for administration of Architect and construction.

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部二技合開(建築)

description.en: This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.

description.zh:
本課程包含數位影像處理之基礎理論與實務技巧外，對於影像處理於工業上之應用，有一些啟發性之基本認知與接觸。課程內容含蓋：
１. 數位影像處理基礎
２. 傅立葉轉換在影像處理與分析之應用
３. 影像加強之處理
４. 影像回復之處理
５. 影像幾何上之轉換與變形
６. 影像之形態處理運算
７. 影像邊緣偵測
影像圖形切割與檢測

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(歷史向度)

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(文化向度)

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級下學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In second semester, Senior students also can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 各種有機化合物之檢驗以及常見有機化學反應之實習。
description.en: It covers the testings and preperations of common organic compounds.

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 染顏料(色料)雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research. This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 大四與碩班合開  雙語教學

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業創新技術議題與實務操作，安排演講及工廠參訪實習，邀請跨領域之企業講師進行紡織工業技術演講，包括機能性纖維研發與應用、環保染整助劑、功能性織物、高強力纖維織物及塑膠回收再生製品開發等相關創新技術進行講演。除了課程中安排學生到相關紡織產業工廠實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

description.zh: 本學科對於再生、非再生資源以及資源再生之現象作一整體性的介紹，並配合原理及實例的講授，以期能對於工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的低價值物料，經由處理而加以回收利用，避免資源的浪費。
description.en: Introduction the recycle of resources.

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en:
The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 
4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en:
Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transport
equipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

name.en: Introduction of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 講授土木工程領域之相關災害的種類、特性、影響，如地震、洪泛、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染等。探討其災害消減及預防規劃，並藉由風險管理的觀念介紹緊急應變計畫的準則。
description.en:
This course introduces the types, characteristics and 
influences of civil engineering related disasters or hazards, such as earthquakes, floods, solpe failures, debris flows, and construction incidents. The hazard mitigation and precaution will also be discussed in class. By the concepts of risk management, the principle of emergency response plan will be introduced.

description.zh: 河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其免受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

description.zh:
1.線性聯立微分方程
2.向量分析
3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分
4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en:
This course deals with the following subjects:
Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   
Ⅱ.Laplace Tnangforms
Ⅲ.Vector Analysis
Ⅳ.Matrices and Determinants
Ⅴ.Fourier Series
Ⅵ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh:
本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。
財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en:
This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. 
Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 網路社群與多媒體設計管理
name.en: Social media and multimedia design and management

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，社群經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以社群設計，並以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容
description.en: The content of this course are how to design and management about the social media and multimedia on the internet.

name.zh: 網路社群與多媒體設計管理
name.en: Social media and multimedia design and management

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，社群經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以社群設計，並以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容
description.en: The content of this course are how to design and management about the social media and multimedia on the internet.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路行銷各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路創業與行銷的實務規劃之能力。
description.en: As a business owner, it is essential to understand the different options and technologies available. Using Internet marketing you have the following benefits 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

notes: 工管三合開40人，電腦教室，須先修過商業網站設計

name.zh: 製造與工作環境之AR/VR實作
name.en: AR/VR exercise of manufacturing and workspace design

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何把擴增實境(Augmented Reality)及虛擬實境(Virtual Reality)技術應用在製造業以及工作環境之設計，實作單元包含：人機互動系統實驗設計、Unity軟體入門操作等。
description.en: The goal of the exercise course is to empower students in learning the practical uses of  AR (Augmented Reality) and VR (Virtual Reality) technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The exercise units include: experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training of Unity, etc.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh:
在網路商店上出售商品時，總是希望能剌激消費者的購買慾、或是能吸引客源增加銷售量。在這樣一個情況下，能夠給網路買家留下一個好印象且能左右商品購買率的，便是商品照片的好壞。
本課程中我們將教你網拍商品攝影的技巧，實拍經驗的養成及商業攝影的商品、空間與質感的表現方法。以網路商品用的「靜物攝影」為重點，嚴選60項最常見的網路販賣商品，透過整合基礎攝影的know-how，教導如何一個人利用數位相機，以最簡潔、便利而又能拍出高品質照片為目的的商品攝影，是網路創業的必要能力。課程內容包含：
商業攝影器材使用、攝影棚光源運用(攝影棚)、廣告商品實拍(攝影棚)、學員作品的討論及檢討。
description.en: When you sell something in the internet, take a good picture is very important. This course will teach you how to take a good picture.

notes: 甲乙合開，計網電腦教室，限50人

description.zh: 介紹電子、半導體、績體電路及數位技術的基本原理、及其應用。期使工業設計學生能具備21世紀微電子e世代產品新科技之基本知識。
description.en: A general introduce to the principle of Electronic technology, Semi-conductor, Integrated circuits, Digital technology, and their industrial applications. In order to equip design students with the basic knowledge of Micro-electronic with in the new Era.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。

With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。

The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 多元文化不僅是當今世界的主流人文思維，也代表一種普世價值觀，更是全球人類彼此互動往來--地球村的基調。這門課主要是引導學生探討文化的意義，以及文化史的內涵，希望在有限的時間內，重點式的的介紹世界各主要國家的文化特色，經由對異文化的認識與比較，能夠協助學生建立較寬闊而多元的文化認知及價值取向。
description.en: Multi-culture is emerging as the mainstream field of humanities, involving not only a representation of universalism but also an interwoven tapestry of cross-cultural communication, which forms the fundamental structure of a global village. This course is to inspire students to search for the meaning of distinct cultures as well as the essence of cultural.
