This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 

In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities and then submit their plans to the departmental office for approval by the beginning of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至土木工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業機構之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the civil engineering related fields in one of the corporative civil engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative civil engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering and biotechnology related fields in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至材料及資源工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生每學期必須撰寫實習心得報告以便評分。
description.en: The course is developed to enhance the on-job practical capability of students. Students are trained for an academic year in corporative company or organizations of materials and Mineral Resources Engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to meet the course requirement for each semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得長期(一學年)體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their long working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用全學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during full curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for full-time at least 4.5 months. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用課餘至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。

Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

Participation in one of the corporative company during semester period, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。

The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至機械相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。

name.zh: 部份工時學期校外實習

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至光電工程相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an electro-optical engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗光電產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a electric-optic engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期到工業工程與管理相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the industrial engineering and management related fields in one of the corporative industrial engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative industrial engineering and management company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
    學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，向指導教師提出計畫審查。指導教師同意後，學生於加退選週結束前向系辦公室登記申請。
description.en:
This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 

In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities, and submit to their instructors for approval. With instructors’ approval, they need to make registration to the departmental office for application by the end of the add/drop course selection weeks of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。

description.zh: 本實習課程包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料 搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採 成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: arious mining exploitation methods and mining equipment involved are introduced in this class. It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface). The laboratory exercises include mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 1.薄膜製程簡述，2.薄膜在產業上的應用，3.薄膜製備，4.薄膜X-ray分析，5.薄膜表面分析，6.薄膜電性分析，7.薄膜光譜分析
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to thin film process 2.Thin films in idustry 3.Thin film process 4.XRD analysis 5.Morphology 6.Electrical Properties 7.Optical Properties

description.zh: 飾品製作前，即使飾品的設計很重要，但是工藝(craft)，工法(skill)與工具的運用,需要更為熟悉。如何讓飾品的設計貼近人類?答案是創意思考，創意思考是來自於人、事物，例如動物、植物所演變的設計元素，或是來自於故事。文化創意是藉由多元的方式呈現出美感  ，其中飾品也是呈現文化創意之一的方式。透過課程讓學生更能夠了解金工(珠寶)的加工技術，並藉由創意來設計出文化的意涵
description.en: Before the production of jewelry, even if the design of jewelry is very important, but the craft, skill and the use of tools, need to be more familiar. How to make jewelry design closest to human? The answer is creative thinking, creative thinking is from the people, things, such as animals, plants evolved design elements, or from the story. Cultural creativity is by a variety of ways to show a sense of beauty, which jewelry is also a way to show cultural creativity Through the course so that students can better understand the metalworking (jewelry) processing technology, and by creative to design the meaning of culture.

name.zh: 里特費爾法在X光繞射之解析
name.en: Rietveld refinement analysis on x-ray powder diffraction data

description.zh:
無論在學界或業界，X光粉末繞射實驗廣泛被應用於各種材料結構的鑑定．然而，若要更近一步解析材料的結構與應力，則有賴套用Rietveld精算法，才可以從中萃取出更多的結構資訊。本課程以介紹Rietveld 精算法，並強調實際操作學習進行數據分析為主，以期使學生能在短期密集課程中，學會此方法。本課程將涵蓋以下四大部分: 
1.	基礎結晶學介紹
2.	基本X光粉末繞射原理與實驗介紹
3.	Rietveld 精算方法介紹
4.	Rietveld 法之數據解析實作
description.en:
Powder x-ray diffraction experiment has been widely used to characterize the structure of many materials in academic or industrial field. In order to extract more structural information and strain, it is necessary to apply Rietveld refinement on the experimental data. This course will emphasize on the introduction and practice of Rietveld refinement, and is divided into the following four topics.
1.	Introduction to basic crystallography
2.	Basic principle and experiments of powder x-ray diffraction
3.	Introduction to Rietveld refinement
4.	Data analysis and practice of Rietveld refinement
